website_summaries.verdict: A nice option that's not as "slippery" as some other silk products. For some people, this is preferred.
pros: Excellent beauty benefits reported by users
Colors stay vibrant, even after washing
cons: These pillowcases may wrinkle after washing

customer_reviews.title: GREAT silk pillowcase!
customer_reviews.text: I've had "silk" pillowcases before, and they weren't really silk, but I liked them. So I ordered this Zimasilk case, thinking it was more of the same, but it's a step about the others I've had, both in the silkiness, and the fact that there's a zipper on the end. This is pure genius, because with all the other non-zippered pillowcases I've had, the pillows have always slipped out of the case. Adding a zipper solves that problem. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hume

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: Love!! So soft—I haven’t washed it yet—love the navy!! Will be buying again!
customer_reviews.author: kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, Luxurious Pillowcase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pillowcase because I heard that if you sleep on your side (which I do) it's good to use a silk pillow case because it's better for your skin and doesn't create as many wrinkles as normal pillowcases. I can't speak to that aspect of the pillowcase, but I LOVE using this. I thought the fabric might be too slippery or sticky, but it is SO comfortable and feels so nice against my face. The fabric is incredibly soft, smooth and cool. I've found that traditional cotton pillow cases can sometimes bunch and become uncomfortable but that is not the case with this one. I can't recommend this product enough. 10/10 would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Horton

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love it. It is very gentle on my hair ...
customer_reviews.text: I have always had satin pillow cases and always wanted to try silk because of the supposedly benefits. I just could never find any at a reasonable price. I got this pillow case.s a treat for myself during a sale to try. I absolutely love it. It is very gentle on my hair (a huge improvement from the satin). I will be buy more of these for myself and gifts.
customer_reviews.author: DaChic

customer_reviews.title: Less frizzy hair!
customer_reviews.text: Made a huge difference in my hair and skin! I just bought 2 more for my kids. My hair is naturally thick, frizzy and tangled, and I can easily stretch out my time between washings with this. This is the only silk pillowcase I've tried, so I don't have anything to compare it to. But I'm very impressed at the price and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again!
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice! I got one for myself and one for my boyfriend, as he really liked my satin pillocase and has been asking me for one for himself. Did him one better and got silk! They are pretty true to color (taupe) and match our sheets perfectly. They also came very nicely packaged in a little plastic zipper envelope. I accidentally ordered a slightly bigger size than I need, so it gives me a perfect excuse to replace my flattened pillows. They do come out of the package pretty wrinkled along the fold lines, if you care about that. I'm guessing the lines will fade with time though, so no biggie :)
customer_reviews.author: Christina Palermo

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have bought one of these years ago! I have hair just past my shoulder & it's always getting tangled when I sleep. Since I've had this case, I no longer have that problem. And it washes up great too! I just lay it on top of my dryer when it's running (I don't place it inside my dryer) & by the end of the day, it's completely dried.
customer_reviews.author: killrnails

customer_reviews.title: Soft and comfy
customer_reviews.text: This is my first silk pillow case. I had a polyester case that was hot. This natural fabric is cooler and is very soft. I like the size because it went on my foam pillow without a struggle. The zipper is hidden, and it's silk on both sides. This will cut down on laundry frequency because I can flip the pillowcase over and sleep on the other side. Because it's packaged so nicely, I plan to order again for gifts.
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: Great for my curly hair
customer_reviews.text: I have curly hair and needed a silky pillowcase to help prevent tangles in the back of my hair. This pillowcase worked for that purpose so well that I ordered a second so I can have a clean one while the other is washing. Also, although it has nothing to do with the product's effectiveness, I really liked the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: J. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Dirty and infectious
customer_reviews.text: I got impetigo (a contagious bacterial infection) on my FACE after using this product. Absolutely disgusting.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine T

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful !
customer_reviews.text: Glorious ! I had my doubts if I would like to sleep on silk, or if it would really have any effect on my long color treated hair. Last night was my first night using it, when I went to bed my hair was slightly frizzy from the humidity here in Florida.....woke this morning to soft, wavy, healthy looking hair.....I am amazed ! I bought lavendar, it's lovely to look at too !
customer_reviews.author: mary beth johnson

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointing
customer_reviews.text: Got two if these. Each in its box. Please see the picture. They have a diferent silk texture. They have a different colour. They have a different size. All is visible from the picture. And I did not even mention that one was nicely foulded and the other was all crumpled. They were a gift and you can imagine my embarrassment when the person opened them up and they looked so different. One was worth the money, the other one was a ripoff. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: fell apart
customer_reviews.text: This pillowcase was beautiful, however after several months the seam at either side of the zipper completely fell apart. Company had enclosed a card to let them know if i was unsatisfied in any way & of course months later I don't have that card anymore. I don't feel it should have totally fallen apart in about 8-9 months of purchase. Would send back if I could. Like I said I loved it & it was beautiful upon arrival however.
customer_reviews.author: ria

customer_reviews.title: One case must have been defective/second
customer_reviews.text: Washed for first time, one case turned out perfect. The other lost color and has spots. Followed directions and used Woolite detergent.
customer_reviews.author: Everette Goins

customer_reviews.title: not happy
customer_reviews.text: It looked beautiful when it arrived brand new but of course I had to wash it before using it. I followed the washing instructions as provided and it ended up terribly. Very wrinkly and thin material
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Zippers don't have a stop so unzip carefully if you want to ever be able to zip these up again
customer_reviews.text: I bought the coral color and love it. It's very silky and works as expected for having my hair slide across instead of getting all tangled and messy by morning. The sliding takes a little getting used to. One thing to be very very very cautious of is that these things are not made with zipper stops and that means if you unzip without caution you will not be able to zip it ever again as a zipper handle will come off. For the price maybe it's worth sewing darning stop or putting a safety pin in place prevent accidental over zipping?
customer_reviews.author: Boheme PDX

customer_reviews.title: NOT SILK
customer_reviews.text: This is no silk. It’s satin. I compared it to my high quality silk items and this looked shiny and cheap next to it. Felt like a synthetic fiber, and didn’t pass the thread burning test. The burnt thread smelled like burning plastic- which is how synthetic fiber burns.
customer_reviews.author: Marina K

customer_reviews.title: Save your money!!!
customer_reviews.text: Save your money buy a super high thread count cotton pillow case this makes you sweat and it’s not as comfortable as they say it is .....what a mistake!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: michael Allegra

customer_reviews.title: Sleeps hot.
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping to use this for my hair and to be able to sleep comfortably, but as one who is prone to sleeping hot, this pillow exacerbated my problem. I love the silk fabric and the color, but I have to put a cotton pillow case over it to sleep....which defeats the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Not silk, no matter what it says on the ...
customer_reviews.text: Not silk, no matter what it says on the package. If I could give it zero stars for false advertising I would.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I have only washed this once and it already tearing
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: FALSE ADVERTISING
customer_reviews.text: This product is polyester satin, NOT real silk. Do not purchase. Completely false advertising, I am very disappointed. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Not breathable means not real silk
customer_reviews.text: This isn’t silk. Silk is breathable and turns out to be very cool. This case makes for sleeping in a hot box around your face. Which means this pillow case has polyester in it. This is not different than a cheap satin pillowcase.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Thin and wrinkled
customer_reviews.text: Thin and always looks like a wrinkled mess. . I loved my satin pillowcase,but wanted to switch colors,so I thought I'd try silk. Definitely ordering my satin one now and throwing this out!
customer_reviews.author: healthnut

customer_reviews.title: Not As Expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 sets of silk pillow cases believing what was implied from the seller. One set for myself and 1 a gift. After laundering as instructed they turn out severely wrinkled. Even ironing doesn't get all the wrinkles out. They just look bad on the bed. I also had expected my hair to respond in a positive manner after sleeping on silk but instead my hairdo is flattened and greasy when i wake up.
customer_reviews.author: ElaineD

customer_reviews.title: Its super soft, but doesnt perform miracles...
customer_reviews.text: Got these to help avoid squishing my face and causing wrinkles at night. It is deliciously comfortable, but does not help with wrinkles. Old age is fun... Good solid silk pillow for the price, The fact that it did not reverse my ageing is not its fault.
customer_reviews.author: Allyjoe

customer_reviews.title: zipper broke by second use
customer_reviews.text: The pillowcase overall is nice, and I was excited about the pillow case and the comfort. However, after my second wash the zipper already broke. I am disappointed in the quality for the cost of the pillowcase, it should not have broke within two weeks. Poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful BUT Sizing W A Y OFF!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am Rewriting review! I finally used & laundered my beautiful silk pillow cases. I paid a lot more for these...I couldn’t figure out What was Wrong with the Sizing??? Well there Is “4” Inches Difference in them!! They are a standard sizing I Thought I purchased!?!? WHY?? I recorded the same pillow case? I Will be Contacting the Vendor for Replacement! I pretty sure I Paid “$50” collectively for this set!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rob l.

customer_reviews.title: Falling Apart
customer_reviews.text: When I initially got my navy blue pillow case, I was excited! It looked & felt great. I immediately washed it as directed, but the texture seemed to change slightly. It wasn’t quite as silky. I let that go, but now it’s falling apart at the seam & I’ve had it less than 2 months. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Key

customer_reviews.title: No box, but bag; no silk, but satin
customer_reviews.text: I saw the advertising and reviews and it seemed like in 2017 it used to come in a nice box, perfect for a gift. Now it comes in a plastic bag, very similar to the amazon packing bags. I guess it’s ok if you want to use it for yourself, not ok to gift. And I am pretty sure this is satin, no silk. I would also like to see some more patterns and colors.
customer_reviews.author: Codrin

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous luxury.
customer_reviews.text: Was going to purchase the Blissy brand online at $80 each, but I’m so glad I chose this instead. It’s wonderfully soft and luxurious. It has a nice zipper on the open end so your pillow doesn’t slide out. There’s no need to pay more for this level of quality. Washes beautifully too (drip dry). I bought one to try and then another the same day it was received. I bought 12 more yesterday to give as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Stovall

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for fine hair!
customer_reviews.text: I have very fine hair and usually wake up in the morning with crazy hair from moving around all night. This pillowcase keeps my hair nice and I don’t ever worry about it irritating my face. The only thing I would like to address is the fact that you have to hand wash this. I’ve washed it twice now since purchasing and it’s a little time consuming, but I want to keep it nice. Other than not being able to throw it in the washer, I absolutely love this pillow case!
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: Silk pillowcase
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent quality silk pillowcase. Is it a five star quality, no. It certainly needs the criteria what's up pillow case. I've purchased some that are better and some that are worse. I was looking for something made as strong as it was back in my ancestor days. The pillowcase does not stay cool for long and that was why I purchased this one. I would not purchase another one for that reason, but if I were looking for a quality silk pillowcase this would be a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy L. Dyer

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Fabric
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time buying a silk pillowcase, so I don't have anything to compare it with. That being said..I didn't expect it to feel to heavy (its not thin) and it's not as silky feeling as I expected, but that's a good thing. I never especially like wearing certain silks because it's too warm. This pillowcase is warmer than I expected and it's not silky or slippery. Not sure how I would feel about it as the weather gets warmer...we will see. The jury is still out when it comes to effectiveness for my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Rimaa

customer_reviews.title: Fake Silk?
customer_reviews.text: When I initially bought this pillowcase it was a dream. It was so soft, so silky and felt luxurious, however, a few months later and I can tell that this is fake silk. It no longer has a lovely sheen, feels like polyester now, and it pulls on my hair. I'm not sure if I have received a fake pillowcase, but I am 100% dissatisfied with this item now. Please be careful as you may receive a fake one like mine.
customer_reviews.author: Beezfun

customer_reviews.title: It does not stay cool.
customer_reviews.text: I sleep basically on my stomach and was looking for a pillowcase that stays cool since I have tried everything out there, this does not stay cool, also I have stopped using face cream at night but still use serum which is dried by the time I get to bed, nevertheless I have stains that did not come out when I washed this with Whip-it. I am glad I bought only one.
customer_reviews.author: ET Maria

customer_reviews.title: Be careful if trying tbo match colors is important to you.
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this silk pillowcase is quite nice, but the color was not at all what I expected. I purchased the light plum, which looked like a medium lavender color on my computer screen, but to me is actually more of a pinkish-dark champagne color. It doesn't match my bedspread at all, but it really wasn't worth the trouble of trying to exchange it, so I kept it. I haven't washed it yet, so don't know about the durability, but the directions say it can be machine washed on a delicate, cold setting if put in a mesh bag first. That sounds easy enough!
customer_reviews.author: Callie & Cooper's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great product but mine ripped after 3 months..
customer_reviews.text: Super love this pillowcase because of how gentle it is on my hair and skin. I waited to write a review so I can test out the quality/difference it made on my hair and skin and I can say it did my hair and skin wonders. My hair is no longer frizzy in the morning and my skincare products stay on better with a silk pillowcase as opposed to being absorbed by a cotton pillowcase. However, after using my Zimasilk for about 3 months, it ripped at the seams and I think sewing it back together isn't that visually appealing ): I guess I get what I paid for?
customer_reviews.author: Vivian Truong

customer_reviews.title: Lovely pillowcase
customer_reviews.text: This pillowcase was a Christmas present from my husband to me. It came within 2 days of ordering it........which was incredible since my husband waited until almost Christmas to place his order. The feel of the silk is very soft and smooth. The color is accurate. It appears well made and the hidden zipper was so well hidden I had trouble finding it. The instructions recommend hand washing in cold water, which I did before use. There was some bleeding of the dye into the water. My first night sleeping on the pillowcase was heavenly. I felt so special. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Sz

customer_reviews.title: Really bad
customer_reviews.text: This is not real silk. Is is extremely scratchy and overpriced. I have bought better quality ones for less from a different brand on Amazon before.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Cordova

customer_reviews.title: Does not last
customer_reviews.text: Don't usually write reviews, but: Bought this pillow case for my wife. She is very careful with her products. Purchased 7/2019. It came unraveled 1/2020. Was great for about 8 months. Washed once a week for 8 months, then it started tearing. I had cotton pillow cases that cost way less that last for years. Cannot recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Delwin M.

customer_reviews.title: Ivory case turned ice blue
customer_reviews.text: The pillow case itself is lovely and the hidden zipper is well constructed. I still wake up with bed head in the morning but I love the smooth coolness of the pillow case. I have followed the washing instructions and always use a mesh bag for washing. It's been a few months now and the ivory color case in now an ice blue. I've not washed anything with color with the pillow case. It's almost as if it has absorbed the color from the laundry detergent. I am disappointed as it doesn't look nice with my ivory sheet set but will continue to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Nalo

customer_reviews.title: After years
customer_reviews.text: After years of waking up and having to grab a tissue to blow her cute little nose my wife after just 2 nights stopped doing that. She made no other changes other than this pillow case but stopped her from being stuffy! She also has found that it keeps her cool instead of having a "hot head" physically not emotionally during the night. Not sure how or what this is made of but maybe there are other things they can make to take care of other things too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not great quality - Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pillowcase on Amazon Prime Day this year, and I was very disappointed when I received my order. When I first removed the pillowcase from the package, the material felt rougher than expected and not soft to the touch. I assumed running it through the wash would solve the problem, but it only made the issue worse. I followed care instructions on how to wash the pillowcase properly, and it came out worse than before washing. I would not recommend these, and there are better options available through other Amazon vendors.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: ZIMASILK 100% Mulberry Silk Pillowcase for Hair and Skin,
customer_reviews.text: The 100% silk pillowcase was advertised as a wonderful product to use for your hair and skin. Well, it didn't work at all for me, If fact, I think I had deeper wrinkles and I'd wake up with my hair looking like Alfalfa. I had a different 100% silk pillowcase which really did help. I don't remember the company that made it. I used it for quite a while and replaced it with the Zimasilk. I do not recommend the Zimasilk pillowcase if you're looking to help have less wrinkles from sleeping on your side or your stomach.
customer_reviews.author: Catnip

customer_reviews.title: Seems to cause more wrinkles than regular pillows
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these because they were supposed to prevent wrinkles on skin. However, for both of them, I found that when I woke up, I actually had cloth-lines on the side of my face from the pillowsheet - which has never happened with any other pillowcase I've used before. Maybe this means I'm getting fewer wrinkles, but I highly doubt it.
customer_reviews.author: Critical customer

customer_reviews.title: Not soft and wrinkles
customer_reviews.text: This isn’t a good quality. The sewing is poor and it’s not soft.
customer_reviews.author: Carole Woodmere

customer_reviews.title: Dollar tree has better pillowcases
customer_reviews.text: I’ve now had this pillowcases for almost 2 months. THEYRE TERRIBLE. After one wash the “softness” as described in the product detail, is gone. Definitely not wrinkle free even with the wrinkle guard setting on the dryer. And lastly the seams are already coming apart even with my washing and drying in a mesh laundry bag. One star for all categories: softness, wrinkle free, and easy to care. I’ve found some silk pillowcases from dollar tree that are so much softer and don’t rip. Save y’all coins
customer_reviews.author: Rockk

customer_reviews.title: Love these pillow cases!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I have been using silk pillow cases for several years and love them at home. We've missed them when we travel. Solution: we bought these quite inexpensive pillow cases and use them every time we travel anywhere. They are not real silk, as are our others, but they work just the same. The hotel maid or stateroom attendant just ignore them and put them back on the bed when they finish cleaning the room. They take up no room in a suitcase and, of course, don't add the weight maximum allowable. Easy and effective!! Huge array of colors to choose from.
customer_reviews.author: Wise shopper

customer_reviews.title: Made me breakout like crazy
customer_reviews.text: I wear moisturizer on my face at night & it felt really gross sleeping on this pillowcase with it on & It made me break out SO BAD all over the sides of my face (that’s never happened to me before). I’m so bummed.
customer_reviews.author: BANANABAT

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied
customer_reviews.text: The pillowcase felt great out of the packaging -- very silky and smooth. I washed it as instructed, and it completely changed. It doesn't feel any different than my other pillowcases, and I haven't noticed a change in my hair. I know it seems like a good deal, but it's probably best to go with the more expensive silk pillowcases.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t do much for hair
customer_reviews.text: I bought a very similar pillowcase last year that did WONDERS for my bed head. I have frizzy hair and this seemed to smooth it out so much; however, this one I purchased doesn’t seem to have the same effect. Still lovely pillowcase but doesn’t seem to help with hair, which was my main purpose for buying.
customer_reviews.author: Fatima

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL SILK!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I knew about silk pillowcases sooner -- the case is soft, so very easy to hand wash and dries in minutes. My bedhead hair is gone! My curls stay mostly in place, no frizzing. On the days I choose to smooth out my curls, my hair is almost perfect the next morning after sleeping on the ZIMASILK pillowcase! Ok, for those of you shaking your heads, hey, I'm a late bloomer but completely sold on this case - just purchased 4 more to give as gifts to my other not-knowing friends. You won't be sorry - worth the small investment!!!! And as a bonus, I'm told a silk pillowcase can aid in the reduction of wrinkles.....time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: We have had these pillow cases for at least 3 months now. I love them! I have always used satin pillow cases because they are good for your hair, and skin. These have been great! Love the zipper, so your pillow never slides out. They continue to look good! There has been no pulling or snags after multiple washes. I will order more from this seller if, and when I need more. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Julierose

customer_reviews.title: Great Until Washed Then Bad
customer_reviews.text: This was great when I first received it. I bought it to keep my hair smooth and worked like a charm until I washed it. I followed the instruction and lined dried but the texture totally changed and no longer kept my hair smooth. A total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Chronister

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my purchase. I gave it 3 stars related to wrinkle free because I wash on delicate and lay it out flat to dry. They dry with mild wrinkles. That said, once I’ve slept on it the wrinkles are not really noticeable. The quality of the silk and zipper seem to be great. I have very sensitive skin so I wash these (I bought more than one pillow case) every 3-4 days. The fit is also just right. Lastly, I have long hair. It seems like there’s far less hair fall out verses my high quality cotton pillow cases. I hope this review helps.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn G

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT ORDER. SKETCHY!!!
customer_reviews.text: Marked undeliverable! This is the second time this has happen with these pillowcases. I feel like this is little sketchy!! DO NOT ORDER!
customer_reviews.author: Momma Mel

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous, Great, Grand!
customer_reviews.text: Ik so I've been wanting the Silk branded pillow case for a long time but just couldn't justify the 100 bucks...then comes along this little beauty. I could not be happier with this purchase! It's so soft, didnt smell weird (something to always be wary of about amazon purchases, lol), and works perfectly! It keeps my hair from going crazy and feels sooo good on my skin. So glad I didnt blow 100 bucks on the branding and got this instead!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandriabeth

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: Its fairly soft and silky but not enough to make you smile the first time you lay on it. It is just barely wirth the sale price and not worth full price.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Cool and comfortable through the night
customer_reviews.text: Actually like this more than I expected. I bought this because silk is supposed to be better for you skin and to avoid creases on your face (less wrinkles or so I have heard). But an unexpected perk is that my head/face does not get as hot during the night as it does with cotton pillow cases. I will most likely buy a few more.
customer_reviews.author: Kitkatjava

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: The seems aren’t strong, tore easy. The fabric stays wrinkled and the fabric is super thin. I’m buying a different one and keeping this only as a backup option. Way overpriced for the quality
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Baso

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and soft
customer_reviews.text: I was searching for a good quality silk case for my mom after she mentioned wanting one. They help let your face “slide” To prevent creases while sleeping (and wrinkles!) and helps with hair too so it doesn’t break while turning in sleep. I gave this to her and she loves it. It’s a single case, I had misread and expected two but that’s my fault. The green color is pretty, minty and serene. Fits a standard size pillow just right. It’s soft, washes nicely, doesn’t really wrinkle and just what she was looking for. I want one in the blush or taupe color now!
customer_reviews.author: sweete13

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, reinforce stitches though
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty darn good pillow case for the price. It's soft and my chocolate stain came out in a simple wash. (night snacking, you know?) The only thing I dont like is how easily a seam came out. I am a tiny seamstress so I am very gentle on fabric but stitches came out when I was just putting it back on my pillow. I'll restitch it, nbd. I'd suggest reinforcing the seams before using just to prevent. It also appears to get water stains (as silky stuff does) BUT after washing and drying, they're gone!
customer_reviews.author: Liliko

customer_reviews.title: Zipper doesn’t cover the whole length of the pillow opening
customer_reviews.text: Zipper doesn’t cover the whole length of the pillow opening, so inserting the pillow is impossible without tearing the ends of the zipper. Every one of my old cheap cases opened all the way, and putting the pillow in was never an issue. Case is soft but super thin, and the packaging says not to tumble dry, so beware if you don’t have hangers to leave it drying in the air. They could have mentioned this on the website description.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not silk
customer_reviews.text: I hand washed it and the truth came out. This one is polyester! I have older silk pillowcases that feel better than this!
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Soft and comfy to me
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using my silk pillowcase for about a month now. While I don’t notice an improvement in my skin or hair, and actually probably note more static in my hair than before (though it’s also mid-winter when I am always staticky). I do like that my face kind of glides in the pillow now. I have never had silk pillowcases before, and in my mind this is extremely soft. It will get wrinkled in the wash, but that’s not important to me. I wash with the rest of my sheets, never use fabric softener, and hang to dry. I am considering getting another to switch out.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: I washed in delicates the first time I received it and air dried it and it don’t feel like silk and is rough. Maybe worth $5 the most. Too expensive. Went back to my regular cotton pillow case.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I'm having a more difficult time figuring out which reviews on Amazon are "authentic" given that "verified reviews" are starting to look suspicious across the board. Was happy to discover that this item was exactly as described and matched previous user descriptions. The pillowcase is very soft and, as a side sleeper, it's been nice to wake up without irritation on one side of my face. I've only had the product for two weeks, so will provide an update in the event that this doesn't survive multiple wash cycles. However, at present moment, very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: gbwilliams55

customer_reviews.title: After hand washing, realized this definitely wasn’t silk
customer_reviews.text: I’m not a silk expert, but this definitely isn’t it y’all. Felt pretty smooth at first, but still somewhat synthetic. I hand washed it in cold water with a mild detergent. A bunch of dye came out and after it dried, the texture had totally changed. Felt much drier. I think it just had a silky veneer on it which got washed off. Slept on it for a night but it was super hot and not breathable, will definitely be returning :(
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: I have bought 4 so far...They are that good
customer_reviews.text: Strong, soft, lovely and useful. Well made and comfortable. I think they are best filled with the buckwheat hulls because it fits my neck perfectly that way. However, they are wonderful over whatever pillow filling you like. I know because the two I gave as gifts with lavender sachets were big hits. I was not sure I wanted silk, because I didn't know how it would wash. No worries though, these wash in cold water perfectly and dry quickly. Looking just a beautiful as before.
customer_reviews.author: N. Basile

customer_reviews.title: Its Hot to sleep on It
customer_reviews.text: I was so exited to get this pillow case for its beauty purposes, but unfortunately personally for me its a one star product because it is hot to sleep on . I was waking up in the middle of the night because my neck and hair was sweaty lol and i am never like that especially with Ac on . Gave it a try for 5 days , and changed back to 100% cotton ;( hope it works for someone else
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Super soft and easy to care for.
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected. I waited to write the review until I really tested them out. Easy to put on. Perfect fit. No messy hair. Better than the department store brand. Perfect for myself and my daughter's. Wrinkle free. Easy to wash. I ordered 3 more a month after I fell in love to make sure I always have available. A must have and feels so soft. Great value for the money. Would order again. Fast shipping and they work amazing. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: dawn shippy

customer_reviews.title: Sad customer!
customer_reviews.text: When I purchase this product for me and my husband,I was more than happy to enjoy it. I waited for this review bc I listened my friend who was disappointed by bad quality. I thought it will not happen in my case, sadly it did. By the zipper, both pillowcases tears apart. I was soooo sad bc I loved them, I washed them hand only with special mild detergent for silk. Customer service doesn’t respond and unfortunately I will not recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Dusko Gajic

customer_reviews.title: Pleasing to sleep on
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely pillow case with a good zipper that you don't feel when you are sleeping. It washes well and I don't put it in the dryer, just smooth it out on top of the dryer while the sheets are drying. It dries quickly . I would have given it five full stars, but the color isn't what I thought it would be when I ordered it - it's much sharper in color than the selections showed when ordering. It just seemed to picky to return it at that time, so I kept it. I'm glad I did. It's really nice to sleep on.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: excellent pillowcases
customer_reviews.text: I bought two and have been using them pretty much constantly for months. No wear yet, and always cool and smooth. They fit my temperpedic pillows perfectly and the zipper is tiny and well hidden. Of course they show drool stains so you have to wash them often. Make sure you air dry and don't put them in a hot dryer! Silk is supposedly anti-dust mite, and good for avoiding face wrinkles - I'm not sure if either is true enough to be worth it, but just sleeping on silk is lovely! Highly reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: J & D Bradshaw

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for price at 1/3 of Slip Pillowcases
customer_reviews.text: I've had two of these for 2.5 months, tossed them in the washer (cold/regular) probably 7-8x already and they're holding up really well so far. I also own 2 Slip pillowcases($70+) and had them for about 3 years now. While I do love Slip pillowcases, they are expensive and the colors/shine faded and silk became much less soft after about a year. These pillowcases are much thinner than the Slip ones but I'm really enjoying the lightness & softness of them. I do not expect these to last years to come but I also like to switch pillowcases every year to two years or so, so these will do just fine for now!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Feels soft on face and hair.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pillowcase on prime day after hearing the benefits of having a silk pillowcase for your skin and hair. I have noticed that my hair gets less tangled during the night using this pillowcase and seems to be less crazy in the morning than it otherwise has been. I can't speak for any skin benefits but it does feel soft and comfy to sleep on. It is slightly too large for the pillow I have it on which makes it look baggy and weird but I don't mind all too much. It has a zipper on one side instead of being open.
customer_reviews.author: Dopey

customer_reviews.title: They don’t need to be hand washed-
customer_reviews.text: These covers are oversized- Get a size Smaller! I have king and the QUEEN sized fit perfectly on the king pillow. Loved the color, nice hidden zipper- Handwashing is recommended but have thrown them in the wash with other delicates and just fine! I do not dry them, and they will definitely need a quick ironing once dry Dry. Crazy but try, I have not woken up with a sweaty head since purchasing. You really only need one, but treated myself to 2 and happy I did.
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Check the zippers
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying silk pillowcases for many gifts and for my family and loved them all and rec'd such good reviews because there were ladies a gave them after their hair started falling out after breast cancer treatments-always smooth on their heads and they raved how much better they felt after giving them. This last one had some thread pulls and zipper issue so I re-ordered 2 more. Please give them a try, my issue was a 1 time issue I believe.
customer_reviews.author: Micki B.

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: I wish I purchased this a long time ago. I've been wanting a satin type pillow case for my hair and skin. I love that it has a zipper closure. I am not an expert of silk, but I decided to go with silk since it's natural. I am please with this pillow case. Some satin pillow cases are made from polyester, which is plastic. A lot of bedding products contain flame retardants that are toxic, which I want to avoid. Going with silk seemed like the best option. I am so happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Too hot for me
customer_reviews.text: I tried to use this on a recent cruise as I like to take my own pillowcase to cover the ones on the ship, however after only five minutes I had to take it off as it was just TOO HOT against my head. I was hoping the silk would be easier on my earlobes as they tend to ache and turn red with harsh fabrics. Also too much trouble to hand wash and dry. Not worth it. Will continue to use bamboo pillowcases I already have.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper23

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart after only 2.5 months
customer_reviews.text: Received this pillow slip end of April where it is attached to the zipper fabric totally ripped mid July! Money doesn’t grow on trees around here expected a much longer lifespan - and the window for returning this product was only one month so guess they knew it would fall apart in a short time. 😡
customer_reviews.author: colleen

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: I had heard about silk pillowcases for years but thought it was hype. As I aged my hair became drier, more fragile and straw-like. Dry hair products made my hair look oily. Out of frustration I ordered two of these silk pillowcases. Within a week my hair felt softer and more manageable. A couple of weeks out and my hair is frizz free, soft and has a soft sheen. Also my natural curls keep their shape overnight - seriously, no frizz. I haven't changed anything else, just my pillowcase. I wish I had done this 10 years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color, and so soft!
customer_reviews.text: My personal experience is that this is not wrinkle free. I followed the care instructions, and it still was very wrinkled. However, I always iron my pillow cases anyway, so this is not a big deal to me. It has been my experience with silk in general, that it is ALWAYS wrinkled after line drying, and I always expect that I have to iron my silk items. The pillowcase is a little small for my standard size pillow (don't know why), but I fit it in regardless. Other than that I LOVE the color!. As you can see in my photo it compliments my bedding nicely!
customer_reviews.author: Rhubarb and Roots

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Colors are even prettier in person. I got the peacock blue and it is gorgeous and a little bit deeper and richer in tone than the picture shows. The quality is very nice and sturdy. No strange smell like some of the stuff you order off of Amazon. The real mind-blowing part is my hair looked exactly the same when I woke up as it did when I went to bed. It cut 10 to 15 minutes off my morning routine. Thumbs up for sure. Will be ordering more colors!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Real silk but not cooling or very soft
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping this pillowcase would really improve my sleeping experience but it didn't. First of all, I did a silk burn test on the threads and it is silk material which is good news. But unfortunately, it wasn't cooling like I thought and it wasn't really as soft as some of my cotton pillowcases. Meh.
customer_reviews.author: Mari Fong

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my adult granddaughter, so my review will not be from personal use. She had never seen such a pillowcase, but first she was thrilled at the beauty of the silk. Next, she put it against her face and said that it was cool to the touch. I did the same and it felt very soft and cool. Right now this is all I can say until she has used it for a while, but it looks and feels beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Tig

customer_reviews.title: Best pillowcase ever! What a difference!
customer_reviews.text: Love my pillowcase. The color is exactly what I expected. It fits my pillow perfectly. Since using this pillowcase my hair has improved dramatically from frizzy and static to super soft and hardly a tangle. Also my face has greatly benifitted, I suffer from breakouts but since using this pillowcase my face hasmt broken out and my skin feels really soft. I wasnt expecting this much improvment in my skin and hair but am so happy with it I am planning to buy another for my daughter to help with her hair.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Howard

customer_reviews.title: I Love These Pillowcases!
customer_reviews.text: I have had one of these for about 2 years and I love it! I bought another because that gives me one to wash and one to use. Quick-dry! If I wash it in the morning and hang it on my drying rack, it's dry by bedtime or earlier. I love how it doesn't mess my hair up, as I wash it every other day. I get no facial creases either, other than the ones my 69-year-old self has acquired through the process of living. It has held up well, through repeated washings. and I highly recommend it! Yippee!
customer_reviews.author: Gbobmi

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Expected
customer_reviews.text: Many reviews said it didn’t actually help with bedhead or skin. I’ve only been using the case for a few days, but I can say I am more than pleased. I disagree - I feel like my hair is much more kept and my skin isn’t as dry. The comfortability of the case is amazing. It’s so smooth. I had no idea what size to order - so I got a Queen. It’s a bit oversized for my (apparent) standard/twin sized pillow. But because it has a zipper it hasn’t been a problem. I can’t believe I haven’t bought a silk pillowcase sooner.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: i actually like all the silk pillowcases i bought. and these arent much different than other brands i bought (fishers and jimoo). they all feel roughly the same. these are zippered pillowcases which might matter to some of you, as it did for me (fishers is envelope and jimoo is zippered). a bit expensive, as silk pillowcases usually are, and i am not sure the better feel of these pillowcases is worth the price vs some of the better cotton pillowcases, but for me it is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: no problem

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!  I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using satin pillowcases for about 10 years now to help reduce morning wrinkles. This silk case is so much better! It doesn’t get hot and it is so soft and comfy! I love it. I even sleep better since I am not waking up to turn the pillow to get to the cool side. I’ve thought about getting a silk case in the past, but they have been so expensive - this one was affordable and so worth it!
customer_reviews.author: PSB

customer_reviews.title: Very soft, great quality
customer_reviews.text: I just received my silk pillow case. I took several pictures to show the condition it arrived in. The only wrinkle places it had was from being folded inside the packaging. It came in great condition as described. Enclosed in a nice clear packaging. The material is very soft. I chose the lavender color. It is very pretty. I have not used it yet, I plan on it tonight. I am very excited. I will update in a week on the use. I’m sure it’s going to be a nice experience 😊 Please see attached photos
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Not silk,disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I'm disappointed with the silk pillowcases. First of all, the pillowcases feel soft and comfortable. I'm very satisfied with them. But when I first washed them in the washing machine, the pillowcase shrank! They're not durable at all! I was disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: anglebaby

customer_reviews.title: Some good;some bad things about it
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it’s me. I don’t like a wrinkled pillow case. You wash this one time and hang it and it’ll be wrinkled and looked funky. I tolerate it because really it’s just for sleeping on but it does look bad. I do think my hair is less kinky and messy in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: A. Boekenoogen

customer_reviews.title: I'm sold!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this pillowcase! I have a king size bed and I've been considering getting a full set of silk sheets but I was reluctant to spend the money on an entire bed so I figured I would try one single pillow.... the first night had me totally sold. I was blown away by how soft and cool the material is. I will definitely be replacing my sheets very soon. The silk is amazing. If you're thinking about trying silk, I say go for it!
customer_reviews.author: LL

customer_reviews.title: A Gift Worth Giving
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pillowcase for my daughter for a birthday gift. She says it is fantastic. In fact, she is thinking about getting sheets now because she is sleeping so much better. It is supposed to be good for skin and hair, and maybe it is, but she says it is great for comfort. For a person who has difficulty sleeping, it sounds like the Zimasilk pillowcase will help. Good gift for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Not silk
customer_reviews.text: It was definitely not silk. Not good for a polyester one either.
customer_reviews.author: Distraction

customer_reviews.title: soft & comfy; easy on the curls
customer_reviews.text: I love this pillow case. It's super soft & comfortable, and doesn't crush my curls overnight. And it washes up really well. It has silk on both sides (yeah!), and has a wide zip opening that makes it easy to get onto my contour pillow. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Much more comfortable than a regular pillow case.
customer_reviews.text: It’s is soft but not as soft as I was hoping. I was also hoping for more of a cooling effect. But I would recommend it as far as softness and comfort compared to a regular pillow case. I can’t speak to whether it helps with face wrinkles or not as I haven’t noticed a difference. Others mentioned that it doesn’t mess hair up like traditional cases, I have very long hair and I have not noticed it to be any different than a regular case.
customer_reviews.author: caligirl

product_meta.title: ZIMASILK 100% Mulberry Silk Pillowcase for Hair and Skin,with Hidden Zipper,Both Side 19 Momme Silk,600 Thread Count, 1pc (Queen 20''x30'', Taupe)
feature_bullets: ✅Good Material：100% Mulberry Silk,both side 19 Momme 600 thread count,with hidden zipper design.

✅Multi Size&Color:QUEEN 20x30 Inches (50cmX75cm)fits most QUEEN size pillows. KING 20x36 Inches(50cmx90cm) fits most KING size pillows.STANDARD size 20x26 Inches (50cmX66cm)fits most STANDARD size. Superior durable plain color for choose ,not easy to run after washing.Exquisite craftmanship of the neat stitches.
✅Anti-aging:ZIMASILK Silk Pillowcase,the natural anti-aging product,hypoallergenic,smooth,soft and breathable.It takes you into a beautiful dream.

✅Wrinkle free &Best for hair and skin: The silk pillowcases prevent hair from becoming knotted and matted,have good sleeping,reduce facial wrinkles. Silky and naturally,WON’T cause irritation to your delicate skins.

✅GREAT GIFT CHOICE:Ideal gift choice for Thanksgiving,Christmas,New Year festivals.We hopefully you appreciate a value experience.It is really a wonderful and secret gift for you and your lovers keeping young.
